short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Scriptmonkey Simple lets users inject and manage custom scripts on web pages, similar to Tampermonkey.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Scriptmonkey Simple allows users to inject and manage custom scripts on web pages, providing a similar functionality to Tampermonkey. With an easy-to-use interface, users can add, delete, and organize their user scripts to enhance and personalize their web browsing experience.
